oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-02-08 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 8, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performer Jimmie Skinner, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Shorty Lavender, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 957th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Rod Brasfield; Jimmie Skinner; Shorty Lavender; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- Bimbo (Jim Reeves) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves and Grant Turner introduce Jimmie Skinner -- I Found My Girl In The U.S.A. (Jimmie Skinner) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Shorty Lavender -- Katy Hill (Shorty Lavender fiddle) -- Jim Reeves talks -- An Evening Prayer (Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Chet Atkins -- Portuguese Washerwoman (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Lavender, Shorty; Reeves, Jim; Skinner, Jimmie, 1909-1979
